name: Bleak Friday
description:
Warning: This game is hard, but probably not as hard as some of the other entries, so I think it's OK.

 ~ CONTROLS ~

Arrow keys/L stick to move

Left click/R trigger to use items

Comma and period keys/L and R bumpers to switch items

Space/East face button to buy from shops

N/Select to toggle the shopping list

Esc/Select on start screen to quit

~ YOUR QUEST ~

You are a strong, independent woman who is "Karen" very much about her family. It's Black Friday, so you head to the mall, shopping list in hand, to grab some deals. Go through the three doors at the north end of each floor to check out the wares available, and buy the item of the shopping list that's on your floor. There are ten floors, and once you get to the top, you just have to climb back down to win! Of course, you have to battle be-hoodied ghosts and Segway-riding zombies to get your prizes, but don't be afraid!
